description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4ecom","text":"This protocol describes the preparation of Sera-mag SpeedBeads with PEG-salt buffer for downstream use in the Automated Bar-Seq Library Preparation protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":110,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":110,"length":37}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7496FBD07EA84AC9AB49E7CF07833A9C","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.3byl49qdjgo5/v1"}}}}
disclaimer: {"blocks":[{"key":"921id","text":"The protocol outlined in this document was created as a part of the Pooled, Growth-Based Assays for Protein Function Measurements pipeline for Align to Innovate’s Open Dataset Initiative. Align to Innovate is a non-profit research organization operating under open science principles with the goal of improving science research with programmable experiments. The Open Datasets Initiative is working to accelerate community-driven science with the use of automated labs to pioneer robust data collection methods and curated, high-fidelity, public biological datasets amenable to machine learning. This work was supported by Align to Innovate’s Open Datasets Initiative which receives philanthropic funding in part from Griffin Catalyst.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":68,"length":61}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Pooled, Growth-Based Assays for Protein Function Measurements

keywords: Deep mutational scanning, protein sequence-function relationships, fitness landscape, laboratory automation
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"n35f","text":"Instruments:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3dkop","text":"Magnetic separation rack compatible with 2 mL microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c7c9g","text":"Non-magnetic tube rack","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3aie0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"41b8i","text":"Reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8h3m3","text":"15 mL of Sera-mag SpeedBeads Solution (MilliporeSigma 65152105050250)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mq8f","text":"15 mL of TE Buffer, Composition: 10 mM Tris-HCl (pH 8.0) and 0.1 mM EDTA (ThermoFisher 12090015)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4pcl1","text":"Polyethylene Glycol (PEG) 8000 (ThermoFisher 43443.36)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blmki","text":"Sodium Chloride (NaCl) 5M Solution  (MilliporeSigma 59222C","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o037","text":"Tris-HCl 1M Solution, pH 8.0 (ThermoFisher J22638.K2)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5tc8h","text":"Ethylenediaminetetraacetic acid (EDTA) solution (Millipore Sigma E8008)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32r71","text":"Nuclease-free water (ThermoFisher 4387936)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"du7i0","text":"Tween 20 (MilliporeSigma P9416)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn3vd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bflr","text":"Consumables:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ua5v","text":"15 individual 2 mL microcentrifuge tubes (Celltreat 229446)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1vtvb","text":"50 mL sterile conical tubes (ThermoFisher 339652)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8q22c","text":"Vortex 15 mL Sera-mag SpeedBeads solution until beads are uniformly distributed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ms4u","text":"Place all 15 of the tubes on the tube magnetic separation rack until beads are drawn to magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fra2f","text":"Remove the supernatant from each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dic94","text":"Transfer 1 mL to each of the fifteen 2 mL microcentrifuge tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fvp6o","text":"Add 1 mL TE buffer to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"afh1l","text":"Remove the tubes from the magnetic stand and mix by vortexing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"28h8v","text":"Return tubes to the magnetic separation rack and wait until beads are drawn to magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8k6qa","text":"Remove supernatant from each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"95d2s","text":"Add 1 mL TE buffer to each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ikja","text":"Remove the tubes from the magnetic stand and mix by vortexing","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6e8co","text":"Return tubes to the magnetic separation rack and wait until beads are drawn to magnet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"m5hm","text":"Remove supernatant from each tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ajaue","text":"Add 1 mL TE to each tube and remove from magnet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8b0fg","text":"Fully resuspend by vortexing and set in a non-magnetic tube rack (not on magnetic stand).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kgvo","text":"Note: Beads that have been washed and resuspended in TE can be stored in the refrigerator at this point and used for the following steps as needed.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: SeraPure beads/PEG/NaCl buffer preparation
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"etcfl","text":"These steps detail how the washed and resuspended SpeedBeads can be used directly to make the beads/PEG/NaCl buffer preparation required downstream for the Automated Bar-Seq Library Preparation Protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

cases.title: Store for future use
cases.description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7d2bn","text":"Beads that have been washed and resuspended in TE can be stored in the refrigerator at this point and used for the following steps as needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"45m9b","text":"Add 9 g PEG-8000 to a 50 mL sterile conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2dbji","text":"Add 10 mL 5 mol/L NaCl to the conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3cbst","text":"Add 500 µL 1 mol/L Tris-HCl, pH8 to the conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"626j3","text":"Add 500 µL 0.5 mol/L EDTA to the conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"caml9","text":"Fill the conical tube to ~45 mL using sterile nuclease free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"36vq3","text":"Mix the conical tube by vortexing every 1-2 minutes until PEG goes into solution.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dna3b","text":"When not vortexing, the tube can be placed on a heated shaker (e.g., Eppendorf ThermoMixer) at 50°C, 600 rpm, to reduce time required to dissolve the PEG","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1ff1","text":" When finished, the solution should be clear.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fg9g7","text":"Add 27.5 μL Tween 20 to the conical tube and mix gently by inverting 4-6 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"10bm9","text":"Mix two 1 mL aliquots of the SpeedBeads + TE solution until the solution is a uniform brown color, then transfer the solutions from both tubes to the 50 mL conical tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fpb20","text":"Fill the conical tube to the 50 mL mark with sterile nuclease free water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ogk5","text":"Wrap in the conical tube in foil (or place in dark container) and store at 4 °C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9qfkk","text":" Gently mix until the solution is a uniformed brown color.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Preparation of Sera-Mag SpeedBeads
